resources.string: Battery fix done! Will reboot when the battery is done changing.
Battery fix done! Remember to reboot for changes to take effect.

Battery fix done.
You need to reboot your device for changes to take effect.

Reboot now?

Atrix Battery Fix
version %s
Copyright © by ravilov <ravilov@linux.hr>

This app helps fix the common "battery won\'t charge beyond xx%%" bug that seems to affect most Motorola Atrix phones. In addition, it deletes the batterystats.bin file, thus forcing battery recalibration. It also attempts to fix ownership and permissions of the battd daemon and its data and config files.
See http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1832470 for more info.

If you find this app useful, feel free to make a donation.
(If the link above doesn\'t work or PayPal reports an error, feel free to send any amount manually via PayPal to ravilov@gmail.com.)

Thanks to xploited for the "battery pull" fix, to bimasakti85 for the battd fix, and to countless XDA members for testing, commenting and contributing.

Full source code is available on github. See the included licence for details.
